translation.en: [man 1] This is your last chance
to stop something very unpleasant from happening.
translation.it: per impedire che accada qualcosa di spiacevole.

translation.en: Wanna tell us where you hid the extra, Lyle?
translation.it: Vuoi dirci dove hai nascosto la scorta, Lyle?

translation.en: [Lyle] Eli, I'm sorry, mate.
[man 1] Talk to me, Lyle!
I'm sorry, Frankie.
[man 1] Get him outta here.
-[Lyle wails] -[Frankie shouts] Lyle! Lyle! Lyle! Lyle!
[man 2] Little shit.
[Lyle] No, no, no! Stop hitting me!
-Call the police, somebody! -[man 2] Come on!
Somebody call the cops!
Don't put me in the fucking trunk! -Shut up! -Put me in the back seat!
translation.it: Mettetemi sul sedile posteriore, non nel bagagliaio!

translation.en: Get in! Shit.
I love you, Frankie!
Shut up!
No, no, no, no…
[man 2] Don't fuck with Ivan Kroll, ya fuckin' idiot.
translation.it: Non si frega Ivan Kroll, verme di merda.

translation.en: [Lyle] What the fuck?
Fuckin'…
Wait!
[Eli] You know, life is really different when you grow up in a family of outlaws.
translation.it: La vita è molto diversa, se cresci in una famiglia di fuorilegge.

translation.en: [Eli] But even in a town like Darra,
translation.it: Ma anche in una città come Darra,

translation.en: you still have school, homework, and doing what grown-ups say.
translation.it: ci sono la scuola, i compiti e fai quello che dicono i grandi.

translation.en: Although I reckon grown-ups can get confused,
translation.it: Però anche i grandi possono sbagliare

translation.en: to make the kind of bad decisions that land them in jail.
translation.it: e commettere errori che li fanno finire in prigione.

translation.en: Boys, wake up.
Slim'll be here soon.
Wake up.
[Eli] So I need to help my mum and stepdad avoid making those mistakes again,
translation.it: Perciò, aiuterò la mamma e il mio patrigno a non rifare gli stessi errori

translation.en: and stay on the straight and narrow.
translation.it: e a restare sulla retta via.

translation.en: -Mum, mum! Guess what! -What?
[Eli] Slim's gonna let me go down the main road this time.
translation.it: Slim mi lascerà guidare sulla strada.

translation.en: -[Frankie] Well, I trust you. -[Eli chuckles]
And he reckons I'm a much better driver than Lyle.
translation.it: Secondo lui guido meglio di Lyle.

translation.en: [Eli] What you makin'?
You know, I'm not entirely sure yet. Maybe ask me later.
translation.it: Non ne sono ancora sicura. Chiedimelo tra un po'.

translation.en: Looks good though.
Thanks.
[Eli] Our mum really is the best in the world.
translation.it: La nostra mamma è la migliore del mondo.

translation.en: She's always tryin' to do what's best for me and my brother Gus,
translation.it: Fa di tutto per me e mio fratello Gus

translation.en: and we're tryin' to get the best for her.
translation.it: e noi vogliamo il meglio per lei.

translation.en: Her only fault is being too trusting of people,
translation.it: Il suo unico difetto è che si fida troppo della gente,

translation.en: but I'm not sure that's a fault.
translation.it: ma non so se sia un difetto.

translation.en: Reckon the little fella wants to drive, eh?
translation.it: Credo che il piccolo voglia guidare.

translation.en: [Eli] The idea of writing this letter actually came from Slim Halliday,
translation.it: L'idea di scrivere questa lettera mi è venuta grazie a Slim Halliday,

translation.en: who you'd know from when he was in Boggo Road Gaol for murder.
translation.it: che avrai incontrato quando era nel carcere di Boggo Road per omicidio.

translation.en: Our step-dad Lyle met Slim in prison as well,
translation.it: Anche il nostro patrigno Lyle ha conosciuto Slim in prigione

translation.en: and these days, we call Slim our babysitter.
translation.it: e adesso è il nostro babysitter.

translation.en: Come on, budge up, then.
You all right? What's Gus writin'?
translation.it: Tutto bene? Cosa sta scrivendo Gus?

translation.en: [Eli] A lot of what my brother writes comes true eventually.
translation.it: Quasi tutto quello che mio fratello scrive si avvera.

translation.en: He's probably the smartest person in the whole of Australia.
translation.it: Credo sia la persona più intelligente di tutta l'Australia.

translation.en: But he hasn't actually spoken since he was seven years old.
translation.it: Ma non dice una parola da quando aveva sette anni.

translation.en: "Your end is a dead blue wren."
translation.it: "La tua fine è uno scricciolo azzurro morto."

translation.en: [Slim] Your what?
I dunno. None of it makes sense till after it's happened.
translation.it: Non lo so. Niente ha senso finché non è successo.

translation.en: Okay, let's get goin'.
Remember what I told ya. Clutch in, ignition on.
Okay. Okay. Up into first.
-[grinding] -And then stead'ly on the peddly.
translation.it: E schiaccia piano piano il pedale.

translation.en: Like that.
[Slim] Hey, come on.
-Let's get on the road. -Hey!
-You’re doing well, eh. -Oh!
That's it, hold it.
[woman 1] Jesus Christ!
Yep. Now you're drivin'.
[Eli] So I started writing to Alex Bermuda.
translation.it: Ho iniziato a scrivere ad Alex Bermuda.

translation.en: Like you said, he's only got four more years in prison if he keeps out of trouble.
translation.it: Ha solo altri quattro anni di prigione se resta fuori dai guai.

translation.en: [Slim] Yeah, well, that's a big "if."
[Eli] Is it really boring in prison?
'Cause I was wondering how you lasted 25 years.
translation.it: Perché mi chiedevo come hai fatto per 25 anni.

translation.en: [woman 2] Learn to fucking drive!
One thing you learn is how to master time.
Slow it all down by focusing on the details
or you can speed it up by being so busy, not enough hours in the day.
translation.it: o lo acceleri facendo tante cose che non bastano le ore del giorno.

translation.en: Busy with what?
[Slim] Collecting cockroach shit, so you can sign your name with it.
translation.it: Raccogli cacche di scarafaggi e le usi per scrivere il tuo nome.

translation.en: Make your bed, read some chapters of your book,
translation.it: Rifai il letto, leggi un libro,

translation.en: play yourself at chess, then play the winner.
translation.it: giochi a scacchi da solo, poi rigiochi perché hai perso.

translation.en: Go fishin' in your mind, down off Redcliffe Jetty.
translation.it: Vai con la mente a pescare al molo di Redcliffe.

translation.en: Catch a big bloody flathead, cook it, watch the sun go down.
translation.it: Prendi un platicefalo grasso, lo cucini, guardi il tramonto.

translation.en: -Brake. -Do what?
Brake!
Now you know what "give way" means.
Okay. Gear stick into neutral.
Ignition on.
Stead'ly on the peddly.
[Eli] According to Slim,
staying on the right side of the law is just like driving.
translation.it: osservare la legge è come guidare.

translation.en: [imitates Slim] "Stead'ly on the peddly."
Lyle, did you see me driving?
I was full-on driving!
Yeah, mate. Hey. You'll make a bloody good driver one day, you will.
translation.it: Sì, socio. Ehi. Un giorno, guiderai benissimo.

translation.en: -[Slim] Better driver than you, mate. -[Lyle] Right-o, Slim.
translation.it: - Meglio di te, amico. - Va bene, Slim.

translation.en: Cheers.
Hey, mate, what you got on tonight?
Frankie, she's doing her Jane Fonda class, and I got a few things I gotta take care of.
translation.it: Frankie ha la lezione di Jane Fonda e io ho da fare.

translation.en: Wondering if you could, uh, keep an eye on the rugrats.
Make sure they do their homework, you know?
Yeah, anytime.
[Lyle] Good on you, mate.
Hey, bugalugs.
Did you thank him?
-[Eli] Oh! Cheers, Slim! -Yeah, bit bloody late now.
translation.it: - Grazie, Slim! - Sì, è un po' tardi.

translation.en: [Eli] Mum, I drove all the way down to the cement factory.
translation.it: Mamma, ho guidato fino al cementificio.

translation.en: And I learned to give way.
[Frankie] Hey, slow down.
Wipe your feet. Stop running.
Closer to home, the Brisbane drug wars take a grisly turn.
translation.it: La guerra alla droga a Brisbane prende una piega macabra.

translation.en: Caitlyn Spies from the Courier Mail has been following the story.
translation.it: Caitlyn Spies di The Courier-Mail si è occupata della storia.

translation.en: All we know so far is that the body of an unidentified man was found…
translation.it: Sappiamo solo che è stato trovato il corpo di un uomo non identificato…

translation.en: Ah, Eli, turn that off.
[Caitlyn] …on a patch of waste ground near Stapleton,
missing his right arm.
Police have linked the killing to the ongoing conflict
translation.it: La polizia ha collegato l'omicidio ai conflitti

translation.en: between rival Asian drug gangs,
and are asking anyone with any information to please come forward.
translation.it: e chiede a chiunque abbia informazioni di farsi avanti.

translation.en: -[Eli] Mum! -It's just the news, Eli.
That was Caitlyn Spies.
I don't care if it was Mikhail Gorbachev. Do your homework.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere Mikhail Gorbachev. Fai i compiti.

translation.en: Oh, shut up.
Boys, stop!
[chuckling] Eli, stop!
Lyle and I are going out later. Slim's babysitting.
translation.it: Lyle e io usciamo più tardi. Slim vi fa da babysitter.

translation.en: Out where?
To the cinema.
Hey, Slim, you're in the paper.
[Slim] Yeah, I saw that.
-[Eli] Is that the guy who put you away? -[Slim] Corrupt psycho that he was.
translation.it: - È quello che ti ha fatto arrestare? - È uno psicopatico corrotto.

translation.en: So, did you actually kill that taxi driver, or didn't you?
translation.it: Quindi, hai davvero ucciso quel tassista o no?

translation.en: [Slim] What do you think?
I dunno. I don't think you're a violent person.
translation.it: Non lo so. Non mi sembri violento.

translation.en: [Slim] Never underestimate what any man is capable of.
translation.it: Mai sottovalutare ciò di cui è capace un uomo.

translation.en: So do you think Lyle's gone back to dealing smack?
translation.it: Credi che Lyle spacci di nuovo eroina?

translation.en: I dunno. Why don't you ask him?
translation.it: Non lo so. Perché non lo chiedi a lui?

translation.en: I didn't wanna put him on the spot. He's doing his best, I suppose.
translation.it: Non volevo metterlo in imbarazzo. Si sta impegnando, credo.

translation.en: You're a good kid.
You reckon?
You just, you know, keep your nose clean, stay out of trouble.
translation.it: Comportati bene, tieniti fuori dai guai.

translation.en: And you let Lyle deal with his own shit.
translation.it: E lascia che Lyle si occupi delle sue cose.

translation.en: [Eli] Dear Alex.
There's a lot that goes unsaid in our kind of family,
translation.it: nella nostra famiglia molte cose non vengono dette

translation.en: either from trying to protect each other or just normal head-in-the-sand kind of stuff.
translation.it: per proteggerci l'un l'altro o per nascondere la testa sotto la sabbia.

translation.en: I'd be interested to see where you stand between saying too much or saying too little.
translation.it: Sarei curioso di sapere se preferisci chi parla troppo o troppo poco.

translation.en: Strikes me that both can end really badly.
translation.it: Secondo me, entrambe le cose possono essere pericolose.

translation.en: Dear Eli, greetings from your pal Alex Bermuda
translation.it: Caro Eli, saluti dal tuo amico Alex Bermuda

translation.en: and the boys in B16.
Still can't get over you knowing Slim Halliday.
translation.it: È incredibile che tu conosca Slim Halliday.

translation.en: What a legend that man is.
In regards to getting involved in things outside of your control,
translation.it: Riguardo al farti coinvolgere in cose al di fuori del tuo controllo,

translation.en: I've had a fair while to consider this myself.
translation.it: ci ho pensato anch'io per tanto tempo.

translation.en: We're all social beings, it's natural to wanna pitch in for your mates.
translation.it: Siamo creature sociali, è naturale voler aiutare gli amici.

translation.en: But then, a lot of bad decisions are made emotionally in the heat of the moment.
translation.it: Ma, nella foga del momento, si prendono le decisioni sbagliate.

translation.en: Case in point, the screws took our TV the other day for some minor misdemeanor,
translation.it: Per esempio, le guardie ci hanno tolto la TV per una stupidaggine l'altro giorno,

translation.en: and the result was pretty untidy.
translation.it: e ne è derivato un gran casino.

translation.en: [TV announcer] Like sands in the hourglass,
translation.it: Come la sabbia in una clessidra,

translation.en: so are the days of our lives.
translation.it: così scorre il tempo della nostra vita.

translation.en: [Alex] You can take a con's freedom, take his rights, take his humanity,
translation.it: A un carcerato puoi togliere la libertà, i diritti, l'umanità,

translation.en: but for God's sake,
don't take his Days of Our Lives.
translation.it: non Il tempo della nostra vita.

translation.en: [Frankie] ♪ Goodbye, Ruby Tuesday ♪
[Frankie] I have to check on the kids.
[Lyle] They're fine. Shh.
So, what was the movie?
The one you were at last night.
Oh yeah, it was good.
Terms of Endearment.
So, what's it about?
It's a love story.
-Does it have a happy ending? -Mm, happy and sad.
translation.it: - Ha un lieto fine? - Felice e triste.

translation.en: Eat your breakfast.
Hey, so my boss says it's all right to bring your kids to work, you know,
translation.it: Ehi, il mio capo dice che va bene portare i figli al lavoro

translation.en: for the show and tell at school. Good news, eh?
translation.it: per il mostra e racconta a scuola. Bello, no?

translation.en: Only problem is we're not your kids.
translation.it: Solo che non siamo figli tuoi.

translation.en: Yeah, well, it's also "bring an annoying little squirt to work" day,
translation.it: È anche il giorno "porta un mocciosetto noioso al lavoro",

translation.en: so I reckon you both qualify. Hm…
So, what did you think of the film last night?
translation.it: Ti è piaciuto il film di ieri sera?

translation.en: -What'd we-- -Terms of Endearment.
Terms of Endearment.
Yeah, it was a real good one.
Real chick flick. -Mm-hmm. -Ask your mum about it.
translation.it: Un film da femmine. Fattelo raccontare da tua mamma.

translation.en: -Hey? -[Frankie] Mm-hmm?
Where's my bloody, um-- Oh, thank you.
And me--
You're the best. Mwah!
All right, I'm offski. Have a good day at school, boys.
translation.it: Va bene, io vado. Buona scuola, ragazzi.

translation.en: You do know that's not physically possible, right?
translation.it: Sai che non è fisicamente possibile.

translation.en: Yeah, well, that is why it's the best preparation for life, mate.
translation.it: Per questo è la preparazione migliore per la vita.

translation.en: Do you think he's dealing again?
'Cause I think he's dealing again.
Yeah, well, not if she ends up on smack again.
translation.it: Non se lei ricomincia a drogarsi però.

translation.en: [Eli] Wanna take the shortcut?
Rack off, Astro Boy! This is our spot.
translation.it: Smamma, Astro Boy! Questo è il nostro posto.

translation.en: Come on, Gus. Just leave it.
Yeah, go on, then.
Gus, is it? We haven't met before.
I'm Poppy Birkbeck, the guidance counselor. Take a seat.
translation.it: Sono Poppy Birkbeck, la consulente scolastica. Siediti.

translation.en: I have to say, you've certainly given my predecessors plenty to think about.
translation.it: Devo dire che hai fatto preoccupare molto i miei predecessori.

translation.en: I mean, everyone's agreed, there's nothing wrong with you physically.
translation.it: Tutti dicono che non c'è niente che non vada in te fisicamente.

translation.en: Hearing's perfect,
and obviously nothing wrong with your brain,
translation.it: e il tuo cervello non ha niente di strano

translation.en: judging by your academic record.
[breathes deeply] So… it's just the speaking we have a problem with.
translation.it: Quindi, l'unico problema è che non parli.

translation.en: Wonder if your artworks tell us something.
translation.it: Magari i tuoi disegni ci riveleranno qualcosa.

translation.en: [Poppy] This was your still life.
translation.it: Questa è la tua natura morta.

translation.en: And this was your still life with flowers.
translation.it: E questa è la tua natura morta con fiori.

translation.en: And a lot of these pictures have this car in there.
translation.it: E molti di questi disegni contengono quest'auto.

translation.en: Family group, Last Wave.
Those kids in the back.
Is that you and your brother?
Heading where?
If you can't say it, write it.
translation.it: Se non riesci a dirlo, scrivilo.

translation.en: Or… draw it.
[opening drawer] I know it may seem pointless, Gus,
but I believe you and your brother have enormous potential,
translation.it: ma tu e tuo fratello avete un potenziale enorme,

translation.en: were it not for some past trauma.
translation.it: se non fosse per qualche trauma passato.

translation.en: It could be your mother's addiction, her leaving your father,
translation.it: Può essere la dipendenza di tua madre o il fatto che abbia lasciato vostro padre

translation.en: or something else you've decided to keep quiet about,
translation.it: o qualcos'altro di cui hai deciso di non parlare

translation.en: in belief that silence will protect you.
translation.it: perché pensi che il silenzio proteggerà te

translation.en: Or someone.
And I'm here to say that silence rarely does that.
translation.it: Ma ti assicuro che il silenzio raramente fa quello.

translation.en: Usually makes it worse.
Draw me what you're hiding, Gus.
Hey, Tinker Bell.
Darren wants you at the back of the science lab.
translation.it: Darren ti vuole nel laboratorio di scienze.

translation.en: Everything all right, Gus?
Hey. What's happening?
Hold out your hands and close your eyes.
translation.it: Stendi le braccia e chiudi gli occhi.

translation.en: He said hold out your hands. You brain-damaged or something?
translation.it: Ti ha detto di stendere le braccia. Sei cerebroleso per caso?

translation.en: Oh, fuckin' hell!
-[Darren] I need you to hold him. -[boy] Do what you're told, bellend.
translation.it: - Devi tenerlo fermo. - Obbedisci, testa di cazzo.

translation.en: You need to stretch him out more. One hand on his neck, one on his tail.
translation.it: Allungalo di più. Una mano sul collo e una sulla coda.

translation.en: On the bin.
Tighter on his tail. You need to wrap your fist around it.
translation.it: Stringi di più sulla coda. Devi stringere il pugno.

translation.en: What are you gonna-- Jesus, fuck!
It's my grandfather's. Samurai steel.
translation.it: È di mio nonno. Spada da samurai.

translation.en: You're from Vietnam, Darren.
There is no way you're descended from a samurai.
translation.it: Non puoi discendere da un samurai.

translation.en: [Darren] Well, my friend, that's what we're about to find out.
translation.it: Beh, amico mio, lo scopriremo fra poco.

translation.en: Oh, for Christ's sake.
Don't piss your pants, I've practiced this.
translation.it: Non fartela sotto, mi sono esercitato.

translation.en: Stay really still, and nothing bad will happen.
translation.it: Resta immobile e non succederà niente di brutto.

translation.en: Darren, this is nuts.
The mind's eye sees everything.
You'll hit my head or cut off one of my hands.
translation.it: Mi taglierai la testa o una mano.

translation.en: -The true warrior does not waver. -They'll put you in juvie! [shouts]
translation.it: - Un guerriero non vacilla. - Finirai in riformatorio!

translation.en: [man] Oi! What are you students doing?
What the bloody hell is going on here?
Those lab rats are school property.
translation.it: I topi da laboratorio sono della scuola.

translation.en: Come with me, pal.
So answer me this, Eli Bell.
In a country such as ours, blessed as it is with natural advantages,
translation.it: In un paese come il nostro, con così tante risorse naturali,

translation.en: why our young folks should be so drawn to crime and petty misdemeanors?
translation.it: perché i giovani commettono crimini e sciocchi malfatti?

translation.en: Uh, I don't know, sir, but I--
I personally blame a lack of physical exercise.
translation.it: Per me, è la mancanza di attività fisica.

translation.en: What were your friends doing behind the science block in the first place?
translation.it: Cosa facevano i tuoi amici dietro il laboratorio?

translation.en: Smoking?
Playing with yourselves?
Oh, they're not my friends, sir. I was--
translation.it: Non sono miei amici, signore, ero…

translation.en: Don't lie to me, Eli. You're really not very good at it.
translation.it: Non mentire, Eli. Non sei molto bravo.

translation.en: Who else was with you?
Oh, uh, they could've been from outside the school, actually.
translation.it: Credo che non siano della scuola.

translation.en: One was big and fat and the other was a little Vietnamese guy.
translation.it: Uno era grosso e grasso e l'altro era un piccolo vietnamita.

translation.en: Yes, well, that's a fair description of half of my PE class.
translation.it: Sì, come metà della classe di educazione fisica.

translation.en: I'm gonna need names.
Drop your strides.
Uh, my-- my what, sir?
Your shorts, off.
All right, now bend over.
Come on! Bend over.
I'm not gonna tell you it won't hurt, 'cause hurting is the point.
translation.it: Non ti dirò che non farà male, perché è quello lo scopo.

translation.en: Punishment will cease when you tell me the name of your co-conspirators.
translation.it: La punizione cesserà quando mi dirai il nome dei cospiratori.

translation.en: Mm, my what, sir?
Why does no one speak English? Your partners in crime.
translation.it: Perché nessuno sa parlare la sua lingua? I tuoi compari.

translation.en: -Your associates! -Ah! Jesus.
Jesus, I'm quite convinced,
-was neither fat nor Vietnamese. -[groaning]
translation.it: non era né grasso né vietnamita.

translation.en: Do we have a name yet?
[Alex] Regarding on how to deal with bullies, you really only have two options.
translation.it: Riguardo a come affrontare i bulli, hai solo due opzioni.

translation.en: Either keep out of their way or take matters into your own hands.
translation.it: O stai alla larga o prendi in mano la situazione.

translation.en: [Alex] Problem with option two being you never know how that's all going to end.
translation.it: Il problema dell'opzione due è che non sai come andrà a finire.

translation.en: So the closer I get to being released, the more I adhere to the prisoner's code.
translation.it: Quindi, più si avvicina il giorno del rilascio più rispetto il codice dei detenuti.

translation.en: Stay out of it,
don't rat on mates,
translation.it: non fare la spia sugli amici,

translation.en: keep your trap shut.
Your silence is admirable, but it's misguided.
translation.it: Il tuo silenzio è ammirevole, ma è sbagliato.

translation.en: I already know the answer, I just wanna hear you say it.
translation.it: Io so già la risposta, voglio solo sentirtelo dire.

translation.en: Very well.
Mum, Lyle?
Mum?
Gus, we shouldn't.
Lyle'll kill us if he finds us in here.
translation.it: Lyle ci ucciderà se ci trova qui.

translation.en: Gus, we can't!
No one's been here since the thing with Mum.
translation.it: Nessuno è stato qui dopo la cosa di mamma.

translation.en: [Eli] Come back.
-What are we supposed to do with Mum? -[Lyle] Sorry, mate.
translation.it: - Che facciamo con la mamma? - Perdonami.

translation.en: -Lyle! -I'll be back, I-- I promise.
[Lyle] I gotta get myself straightened out. I'll be back, I promise, mate.
translation.it: Devo rimettermi in sesto, ok? Tornerò, te lo prometto.

translation.en: [echoes] I'm sorry, mate!
Gus, Lyle's back!
-Lyle! -Hey!
Hello, mate! [laughs]
Let me look at you.
How's Frankie?
Still pretty bad.
All right, let's go get her sorted. [echoes]
[Frankie] Boys, boys, boys, boys…
Boys!
Boys! Boys! [screaming]
[screaming] You fucking arsehole! Fuck!
You're a fucking pig! Fuck!
I fucking hate you!
[Frankie sobbing] Boys, help me! Boys!
Don't do this to me. Don't do this to me.
-Please. -[Lyle] Boys, it's gonna be all right.
translation.it: - Per favore. - Ragazzi, andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: Boys. Boys.
I know you can fucking hear me!
Fuck you! Fuck you all!
Fuck! Fuck you! [echoes]
How did you know about this?
This is insane.
For what? What are we waiting for?
[Eli] Don't answer it!
[man] Eli.
-Eli? -Who is this?
I'll give you three guesses.
No idea. Is this Alex?
translation.it: Non ne ho idea. Sei Alex?

translation.en: There's a million Alexes.
translation.it: Ci sono un milione di Alex.

translation.en: He's my pen friend, doing time in Boggo Road Gaol.
translation.it: È il mio amico di penna, che è nel carcere di Boggo Road.

translation.en: Slim introduced us.
I guess any friend of the taxi driver killer…
translation.it: Se sei un amico dell'assassino del tassista…

translation.en: He didn't kill that guy!
If Slim's your babysitter, he'd have to say that.
translation.it: Se è il tuo babysitter, deve dire così.

translation.en: My mum said he didn't, and my mum's not capable of lying.
translation.it: Mia mamma ha detto di no e lei non sa mentire.

translation.en: Everybody lies, the saints and the sinners.
translation.it: Tutti mentono, i santi e i peccatori.

translation.en: The trick is knowing which one you're talking to. Good luck, Eli.
translation.it: Il trucco è sapere con chi stai parlando. Buona fortuna, Eli.

translation.en: [Lyle] You two better not be down there.
translation.it: È meglio che non siate lì sotto.

translation.en: [Eli] Oh, no! Come on, Gus.
[Lyle] Oi! You little mongrels, get back up here right now!
translation.it: Ehi! Piccoli mocciosi, venite subito qui!

translation.en: -Go, Gus! -Don't you do that, Gus! Gus!
-Eli! -[Eli] Go, Gus, move!
[Lyle] Get up here right now, you two little mongrels!
translation.it: Uscite subito da lì, piccoli mocciosi!

translation.en: What's happening?
The fucking kids are in the emergency tunnel!
translation.it: I ragazzi sono nel tunnel di emergenza!

translation.en: Right, boys, this is it. You're in big shit.
translation.it: Bene, ragazzi, basta. Siete nella merda.

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
Ugh. If they don't bury themselves alive, I'll fuckin' murder 'em.
translation.it: Se non restano sepolti vivi, li ucciderò.

translation.en: Lyle, go easy on them.
Gus, wait for me!
Gus! Gus!
Gus, I'm stuck! Gus, come back.
translation.it: Gus, sono incastrato! Gus, torna indietro.

translation.en: [Frankie] Uh, just make sure they're safe, will ya?
translation.it: Controlla che non si facciano male, ok?

translation.en: [Eli] Something-- It smells like poo!
Where are we?
You're right where you belong, you little wankers.
You're very lucky you both weren't buried alive.
translation.it: Siete fortunati a non essere sepolti vivi.

translation.en: Now come on out.
-Rack off. You'll give us a floggin'. -Dead fuckin' right, I am, mate.
-Well, fuck that, then. -Don't swear!
-You just did. -Yeah, well, I'm an adult, aren't I?
translation.it: - L'hai appena fatto tu. - Ma io sono un adulto.

translation.en: You tell me, Lyle. I thought adults were supposed to learn from their mistakes.
translation.it: Pensavo che gli adulti imparassero dai loro errori.

translation.en: You and Mum are dealing again. It's the truth, innit?
translation.it: Tu e mamma spacciate di nuovo. È così, vero?

translation.en: Just announce it to the whole bloody neighborhood, won't you?
translation.it: Perché non lo dici a tutto il vicinato?

translation.en: Here. Now, get a hold of that
before you both get bloody polio or hepatitis.
translation.it: prima che vi prendiate la poliomielite o l'epatite.

translation.en: Fuck you, Lyle. We spoke to that bloke on the phone.
translation.it: Vaffanculo. Abbiamo parlato con un tizio al telefono.

translation.en: -How come he knows my name? -What bloke?
translation.it: - Come sa il mio nome? - Che tizio?

translation.en: There's no bloke on the phone. It's not even connected!
translation.it: Non c'è nessuno al telefono. Non è neanche collegato!

translation.en: Me and Gus deserve some answers!
translation.it: Io e Gus meritiamo delle risposte!

translation.en: You know what? You deserve to stay down there
until you, little man, learn some bloody manners.
translation.it: finché tu, piccoletto, non impari le buone maniere.

translation.en: Has Lyle got Mum using again?
translation.it: Lyle ha fatto drogare di nuovo la mamma?

translation.en: Fucking Lyle.
[Lyle] Just let her rant and rage, okay, boys?
translation.it: Lasciate che sfoghi la rabbia, ok?

translation.en: I know it's difficult, but we just gotta wait around, okay?
translation.it: So che è difficile, ma dobbiamo aspettare, ok?

translation.en: [Frankie] He's tryin' to kill me, Eli.
Call the cops! He's tryin' to kill me.
translation.it: Chiama la polizia! Sta cercando di uccidermi.

translation.en: Call them and tell he's gonna murder me.
translation.it: Chiama la polizia e di' che vuole uccidermi.

translation.en: [Lyle] You can't help her, mate.
[grunts] Hey.
Group…
Group hug.
You think he's gone out yet?
I'm sorry, Frankie.
Pretty crappy at this dad stuff.
translation.it: Faccio schifo a fare il padre.

translation.en: You're great, Lyle.
We'd have been up shit creek without a paddle if you hadn't given us a home.
translation.it: Saremmo in un mare di merda se non ci avessi dato una casa.

translation.en: -Not much of a home though, is it? -Yes, it is.
translation.it: - Ma non è una gran casa, no? - Sì, lo è.

translation.en: The boys worship you.
And I kinda like you too.
[Eli] Come on, give me a leg up. Come on, Gus…
translation.it: Forza, dammi una spinta. Dai, Gus…

translation.en: Don't, Gus! I'm falling!
Gus! [grunts]
[Eli] Come on, Gus, push!
Ah, where are the bloody buttons on this thing?
translation.it: Dove sono i bottoni di questa cosa?

translation.en: You boys learned your lesson?
Is Lyle still mad at us?
Yeah, no, he's settled. He's watching the footy.
translation.it: Si è calmato. Sta guardando la partita.

translation.en: So he's not gonna flog us?
Not if you say you're sorry.
"Act of having it off," ten letters.
Something, something, "P," something, "T."
Amputation.
-[Eli] Mum. -[Frankie] Mm?
Just promise you and Lyle aren't using again.
translation.it: Giura che non vi state drogando.

translation.en: I promise.
"Family embrace," five and three.
Excuse me.
-[kisses] -Good night.
Why did you run away from our dad?
[Frankie] Eli, it's late. I don't wanna talk about Robert right now.
translation.it: Eli, è tardi. Non voglio parlare di Robert ora.

translation.en: He did bad things, didn't he?
We all do bad things sometimes.
translation.it: Tutti facciamo cose brutte, a volte.

translation.en: Alcoholism is a disease.
He wasn't a well man.
Was he a good man?
He was a good dancer.
-Was he more like me or more like Gus? -I don't know, Eli.
translation.it: - Era più come me o più come Gus? - Non lo so, Eli.

translation.en: He was… like both of you.
Was he scary sometimes?
Like Gus is scary.
Gus isn't scary.
Yes, he is.
Yeah? In what way?
I dunno. It's the stuff he writes in the air with his magic finger.
translation.it: Non lo so. È quello che scrive nell'aria con il suo dito magico.

translation.en: It's like he can hop forwards through time and send back messages from the future.
translation.it: È come se viaggiasse nel tempo e mandasse messaggi dal futuro.

translation.en: Maybe he can.
You ever considered that possibility?
All I know is that boy loves you more than he can say.
translation.it: So solo che quel ragazzo ti ama immensamente.

translation.en: When you were born, he guarded your crib like all human life depended on it.
translation.it: Vegliava sulla tua culla come se ne andasse la vita dell'umanità.

translation.en: He's the best friend you'll ever have.
And you're the best mum.
translation.it: E tu sei la mamma migliore.

translation.en: Nah.
Probably a bit below average, but that's very kind of you to say.
translation.it: Forse un po' al di sotto della media, ma sei gentile.

translation.en: No, really, you're too good for this shitty place.
translation.it: No, sei troppo per questo posto di merda.

translation.en: You were too good for Dad, and now you're too good for Lyle.
translation.it: Eri troppo per papà e sei troppo per Lyle.

translation.en: [Frankie] Don't.
[Eli] You could've been a teacher or a school counselor,
translation.it: Potevi essere un'insegnante o una consulente scolastica,

translation.en: not living with some drop-kick heroin pusher.
translation.it: - non stare con uno spacciatore sfigato. - Basta così.

translation.en: That's enough. Go to bed.
translation.it: - non stare con uno spacciatore sfigato. - Basta così. Vai a letto.

translation.en: [whispering] I'm going after him.
Check where he goes. You coming?
translation.it: Voglio vedere dove va. Vieni con me?

translation.en: [Darren] Don't move.
Tink, if you're gonna be a ninja, last thing you wanna wear
is blue pajamas with half your arse hangin' out.
translation.it: un pigiama blu con metà culo di fuori.

translation.en: I can see your Aussie white bum flashing on and off like a fuckin' lighthouse.
translation.it: Il tuo culo bianco australiano lampeggia come un faro.

translation.en: [sighs] Hi, Darren.
You know, if I chopped your head off, your brain'd stay alive for three minutes.
translation.it: Se ti taglio la testa, il cervello resta vivo per tre minuti.

translation.en: You could carry on talking till you lost all consciousness.
translation.it: Continueresti a parlare fino a perdere conoscenza.

translation.en: I don't think that's true.
Only one way to find out.
translation.it: C'è solo un modo per scoprirlo.

translation.en: Did you shit yourself?
Almost.
What's Lyle doing here?
I reckon he's collecting heroin from your mum.
translation.it: Credo sia venuto a prendere l'eroina da tua mamma.

translation.en: Very good, bellend. Who else knows what he's up to?
translation.it: Molto bene, testa di cazzo. Chi altro sa cosa sta facendo?

translation.en: The guy on the phone, maybe.
What guy on the phone?
There was a guy on the phone. I spoke to him by accident.
translation.it: C'era un tizio al telefono. Gli ho parlato per caso.

translation.en: He seemed to know what was going on. Could've been Ivan Kroll.
translation.it: - Sembrava sapere cosa succede. - Potrebbe essere Ivan Kroll.

translation.en: -Who's Ivan Kroll? -Just an arsehole with a motorbike.
translation.it: - Chi è Ivan Kroll? - Solo uno stronzo con una moto.

translation.en: You see on the news about that bloke who lost an arm?
translation.it: Hai sentito del tizio che ha perso un braccio?

translation.en: That was probably Ivan's work.
Wanna eat something?
-I'll be all right. -You better come in.
Be rude not to.
Shoes off, dick wad.
Check this out.
Go on, have a look.
[woman] …so much money. It's the best.
[Eli] So when did Lyle go back to dealing smack?
[Darren] What makes you think he ever stopped? He just moved up the ladder.
translation.it: Pensavi che avesse smesso? Ha solo fatto carriera.

translation.en: Sucks, doesn't it? Thinking you're with the good guys and discovering you're the bad guys.
translation.it: Brutto, vero? Pensare di stare con i buoni e scoprire di essere i cattivi.

translation.en: [woman] Darren!
-Come, she'd like to meet you. -Oi!
Found this one spying in the yard.
-The one who didn't rat about the rat. -Eli, what are you doin' here?
translation.it: Quello che non ha fatto la spia sul topo. Eli, che ci fai qui?

translation.en: Darren invited me.
It's 1:00 in the morning. Go home!
translation.it: È l'una del mattino. Vai a casa!

translation.en: -'Kay, I'm going. -You always give up that easy?
translation.it: - Ok, vado. - Ti arrendi sempre così facilmente?

translation.en: Why did you come here?
Because he's an idiot.
-Just followed Lyle. -[Lyle] Mm.
Because?
You have question for him.
-Okay, that's enough, guys. -I say when it's enough.
translation.it: - Ok, basta così. - Decido io quando basta.

translation.en: Okay.
Come here, boy.
Closer.
Why don't you ask Lyle
your most important question?
I'll make sure that he answer truthfully.
translation.it: Farò in modo che risponda sinceramente.

translation.en: Why are you dealing drugs again?
-For the money, mate. -So why are we still poor?
translation.it: - Per i soldi. - Ma perché siamo ancora poveri?

translation.en: I said one question.
Now it's my turn.
Why didn't you rat on my son?
translation.it: Perché non hai fatto il nome di mio figlio?

translation.en: It's the prisoner's code. Stay out of it, keep your trap shut.
translation.it: È il codice dei detenuti. Stanne fuori, tieni la bocca chiusa.

translation.en: [woman] You taught him well.
You can both leave now.
Okay.
Bring him back another time.
Maybe we talk about work opportunity.
Okay, thank you.
[woman] Eli?
When he say it just for the money,
translation.it: Quando dice che è solo per i soldi,

translation.en: the money is for your family.
translation.it: i soldi sono per la tua famiglia.

translation.en: He's doing this because he loves you.
translation.it: Lo fa perché vi vuole bene.

translation.en: [in Vietnamese] Off to bed.
[in English] Lyle.
Lyle, come back.
Please, Lyle!
Don't you ever follow me again, you hear?
-[Eli] Lyle! Lyle! -[Lyle] That was really embarrassing.
[crying] You're embarrassed? Lyle, you're a fucking drug dealer!
translation.it: Tu sei imbarazzato? Sei un cazzo di spacciatore!

translation.en: I mean, what the fuck is it with you and Mum?
translation.it: Che cazzo pensate tu e la mamma?

translation.en: "Do your homework! Eat your broccoli! Tidy the kitchen!"
translation.it: "Fai i compiti! Mangia i broccoli! Riordina la cucina!"

translation.en: I mean, like, Mum's an addict, and you're the idiot who got her hooked!
translation.it: Mamma è una drogata e tu sei l'idiota che l'ha fatta drogare!

translation.en: Righto, come on, let's go, mate.
Oh, what-- Get up, Eli. What are you doing? Get up.
translation.it: Alzati, Eli. Che stai facendo? Alzati.

translation.en: -Get up! -I can't.
You're just gonna push me down again.
Don't cry, you great big pussy. What are you crying for?
I don't know.
I just got a whole lot of tears inside me.
translation.it: Ho un sacco di lacrime dentro di me.

translation.en: I can't help it.
Here, clean yourself up.
Take it.
Now, I know dealin' smack is a shitty way to make a livin',
translation.it: Spacciare è un modo di merda per guadagnarsi da vivere,

translation.en: but no one gets rich doing an honest job anymore.
translation.it: ma non ci si arricchisce più con un lavoro onesto.

translation.en: -That's kinda what Darren said. -Oh, did he, now?
translation.it: - È quello che ha detto Darren. - Ha detto così?

translation.en: Honestly.
Pretty soon, mate, we're gonna be away from this place.
translation.it: Presto ce ne andremo da questo posto.

translation.en: Things are gonna get good, I promise.
translation.it: Le cose andranno meglio, te lo prometto.

translation.en: Things are gonna get so good you'll forget they were ever bad.
translation.it: Le cose andranno così bene che dimenticherai che andava male.

translation.en: You ever wondered why you cry so easily?
translation.it: Ti sei mai chiesto perché piangi così facilmente?

translation.en: 'Cause I'm a pussy.
No, because you're a good kid, and don't you ever be ashamed of crying.
translation.it: No, è perché sei un bravo ragazzo, e non vergognarti mai di piangere.

translation.en: You cry because you give a shit.
translation.it: Piangi perché te la prendi a cuore.

translation.en: People that don't cry, they don't give a shit, and God knows there's enough of them fuckwits at large in the world.
translation.it: Chi non piange non prende a cuore niente, e ci sono già troppi idioti al mondo.

translation.en: You good?
You done crying?
Yep.
All right, let's go home.
[whispering] Right, mate, straight to bed, okay?
translation.it: Dai, socio, vai a letto, ok?

translation.en: Hey.
Mum isn't using, but Lyle's dealing like we thought.
translation.it: La mamma non si droga, ma Lyle spaccia, come pensavamo.

translation.en: And Bich Dang offered me a job. I reckon we can help him.
translation.it: E Bich Dang mi ha offerto un lavoro. Possiamo aiutare Lyle.

translation.en: You know, go into business together, make a shitload of money,
translation.it: Possiamo lavorare con lui, guadagnare un sacco di soldi,

translation.en: finally get the cash to move Mum away from here.
translation.it: potremmo portare la mamma via di qui.

translation.en: What do you reckon?
I'm gonna be dead tomorrow.
[Slim] This is a test.
translation.it: PROSSIMAMENTE… È un test. Un test ha valore solo se è difficile da superare.

translation.en: No test is worth anything unless it's difficult to pass.
translation.it: È un test. Un test ha valore solo se è difficile da superare.

translation.en: And this is yours.
[Eli] Bobby!
You look how happy your mum is. Why would you want anyone to risk that?
translation.it: Guarda com'è felice tua mamma. Perché rovinare tutto?

translation.en: Robert's your father.
Are you all right, Dad? Whoa!
[Lyle] It's gonna get better, Frankie.
It's gonna get so good you'll forget it was ever bad.
[Darren] Ivan Kroll is a bogeyman to keep everyone in line.
translation.it: Ivan Kroll è uno spauracchio che tiene tutti in riga.

translation.en: [Slim] Any word of Lyle?
[Eli] No, but I'll find him before anything bad happens to him.
translation.it: No, ma lo troverò prima che gli succeda qualcosa.

translation.en: [Slim] Sometimes bad things happen to get good things.
translation.it: A volte le cose brutte portano cose belle.

translation.en: I promise you that our sacred mission has only just begun.
translation.it: Vi assicuro che la nostra sacra missione è appena iniziata.

translation.en: [Eli] Where's my mum?
[Slim] Your mum is in prison.
I wanna see my boys!
-Are you real? -[Eli] It's not a dream, Mum.
translation.it: - Sei reale? - Non è un sogno, mamma.

translation.en: It's just you and me, Gus. No one's going to help us.
translation.it: Siamo solo io e te, Gus. Nessuno ci aiuterà.

translation.en: Caitlyn Spies? I'm Eli Bell.
You and me, we're the daylight.
translation.it: Tu e io, siamo la luce del giorno.

translation.en: [Frankie] Sending our boys out into the world, it's something to be proud of.
translation.it: I nostri figli si fanno strada nel mondo, è una cosa di cui essere fieri.

translation.en: [Slim] Pain and pleasure's all part of being human.
translation.it: Proviamo dolore e piacere perché siamo umani.

translation.en: And if it doesn't hurt, not real life, mate.
translation.it: Se non fa male, non è vita reale.

translation.en: All you have to do is believe.
♪ Hope it gets through ♪
